name: Call of Sci-Fi Alien Shooter
description:
Get ready for the futuristic shooting game in the sci-fi world against aliens! Game is especially for the sci-fi shooters, You have given advanced guns and you have to shoot aliens.

You have to target very sharply & be active. You are brave enough to target them. Shoot every alien to take your shooting skills to the next level of the alien shooting. In Call of Sci-Fi Aliens Shooter, you will be facing an increasingly large number of alien enemies.
